Articles.Content: Is there a mod that lets you load Kerbals into seats before you launch your craft? I have something that has 36 seats and it would take a while to do it manually. Thanks!
Maybe Crew Manifest? That seems to be a popular crew management mod.
Hmmm, I've tried it. It doesn't seem to list command seats as spaces to move Kerbals to. Perhaps there is a line of code you can alter for the seats so they load like normal cockpits?

Ahh, my bad. I didn't see you were asking about command seats.

I don't believe that mod exists. The command seats work differently than the capsules (more like a docking port). So most of the crew mods won't work for something like that.

Cheers,

~Claw
